github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Scaling improvements - Optimized query execution and added caching layer.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Data growth is impacting query performance. Need to consider sharding and indexing strategies.
github_commits.bug_related: The slow query times are directly related to the increasing data volume and lack of proper indexing.  Need to investigate further.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added Redis caching for frequently accessed data.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Caching is a good first step, but needs to be configured carefully to avoid key conflicts and excessive memory usage.
github_commits.bug_related: The caching layer mitigates some of the query slowdowns, but the root issue of data growth still needs attention.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Scaling and Query Performance

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Scaling pe kaam karna hai. Data toh bad raha hai! Queries bhi slow ho rahe hain.

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon. Redis try kar rahe hain.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and the Redis metrics.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya? Server ka pressure badega kya?

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Let's monitor closely.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: I've seen a spike in Redis memory usage. Need to investigate.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Prioritize implementing caching and then investigate sharding.
slack_conversations.warnings: Data growth is impacting query performance.  Redis caching might not be sufficient in the long run.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: The slow query times are becoming a major concern, especially with the increasing data volume.  Redis isn't providing the expected performance boost.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Scaling and Query Optimization
jira_tickets.description: Address the performance degradation caused by increasing data volume.  This includes exploring sharding, indexing, and caching solutions.  Focus on reducing query execution time.
comments: Update 1: Initial investigation shows slow query on the user profiles table.
Update 2:  Adding indexes to the user profiles table - let's monitor the impact.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: The slow query times are directly related to the increasing data volume and lack of proper indexing.  Need to investigate sharding as well.

confluence_docs.title: Sprint 3: Scaling and Query Performance
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Scaling strategies, including caching, sharding, and indexing.  Also includes best practices for optimizing database queries and monitoring performance.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 3 Planning & Action Items
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the Sprint 3 planning session, outlining the tasks for scaling and query optimization.  Includes action items assigned to team members.
action_items: Arjun: Implement indexes on user profiles table.
Priya:  Set up Redis caching for frequently accessed data.
decisions_made: Implement Redis caching as a first step.
Investigate sharding if caching doesn't provide sufficient performance improvements.
google_docs.bug_mentions: The slow query times on user profiles are a critical issue that needs immediate attention.
